postReview.title: Manchester City 1-0 Wolves: De Bruyne pushes hosts towards Champions League
postReview.description: Manchester City took a big step towards a top-five Premier League finish on Friday, holding off in-form Wolves for a 1-0 win at the Etihad.

preReview.title: Guardiola confirms Rodri and Haaland back in Man City training
preReview.description: Manchester City have been handed a timely injury boost for their Champions League push, with Rodri and Erling Haaland back in training.

QAData.question: Who won between Manchester City and Wolverhampton Wanderers on Fri, 02 May 2025 19:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Manchester City won 1–0 over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Fri, 02 May 2025 19:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Bernardo Silva was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.1.

Ruben Dias is the most accurate passer (99%) in the match.
